member.name: T:VBScripting.IFolderChooser2
member.summary: Present the Windows Vista-style open file dialog to select a folder.

member.name: P:VBScripting.FolderChooser2.InitialDirectory
member.summary: Gets or sets the initial directory that the folder select dialog opens to. Environment variables are allowed. Relative paths are allowed. Optional. The default value is the current directory.

member.name: P:VBScripting.FolderChooser2.Title
member.summary: Sets the title/caption of the folder select dialog. Optional. The default value is "Select a folder".

member.name: P:VBScripting.FolderChooser2.FolderName
member.summary: Opens a dialog and returns the folder selected by the user.
